mapper.insert: insert into tbl_gunews_file (fileId, uuid, fileName, uploadPath, altText, insertYn, gnewsId) values (seq_gunews_file.nextval, #{uuid}, #{fileName}, #{uploadPath}, #{altText}, #{insertYn}, #{gnewsId})
mapper.select: select fileId, uuid, fileName, uploadPath, altText, insertYn, gnewsId from tbl_gunews_file where fileId = #{fileId}
select fileId, uuid, fileName, uploadPath, altText, insertYn, gnewsId from tbl_gunews_file where gnewsId = #{gnewsId} order by fileId
select count(*) from tbl_gunews_file where gnewsId = #{gnewsId}
